mapper.select: SELECT g.*, s.*, gm.pay_ny, gm.del_ny, gm.pay_date FROM game_member AS gm INNER JOIN game AS g ON gm.game_idx = g.game_idx INNER JOIN stadium AS s ON g.stadium_idx = s.stadium_idx WHERE gm.user_idx = #{user_idx} LIMIT 0, #{cnt}

SELECT g.*, s.*, gm.pay_ny, gm.del_ny, gm.pay_date FROM game_member AS gm INNER JOIN game AS g ON gm.game_idx = g.game_idx INNER JOIN stadium AS s ON g.stadium_idx = s.stadium_idx WHERE gm.user_idx = #{user_idx} AND g.end_time_mill >= #{now_time_mill}
SELECT * FROM game_member WHERE user_idx=#{user_idx} AND del_ny='n'
SELECT * FROM game_member AS gm INNER JOIN user AS u ON gm.user_idx=u.user_idx WHERE gm.game_idx=#{game_idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO game_member (game_idx, user_idx, name, tel, price, pay_ny, del_ny, pay_date, created_date) VALUES (#{game_idx}, #{user_idx}, #{name}, #{tel}, #{price}, #{pay_ny}, 'n', SYSDATE(), SYSDATE())
